name: Spellshook
description:
Spellshook is a FPS (First Person Spellslinger) where you fight enemies, gain experience, and upgrade spells to fight more betterer. Exploit elemental weaknesses, utilize movement abilities, and cast regenerative magic to survive against endless waves of enemies. Spellshook was created in Unreal Engine 4 over the course of two weeks for our Game Programming final project.

Controls:

  • WASD/Space : Move and jump
  • LMB : Cast spell
  • Mouse Wheel/1-5 keys : Switch spells
  • Ctrl+Number Key: Upgrade corresponding spell
  • P: Pause

Developers:

  • Eric Li
  • Zara Morton
  • Elizabeth Rodriguez
  • Hamza Ali
  • Sindhu Nemana

Voice acting by Zara Morton and Phillip Collins

Title Music: "Fantasy Ambience" - David Fesliyan
